title: Ticket #5841: Implement proxy delegation for HTCondor-CE-Bosco
description: HTCondor-CE-Bosco is an implementation of HTCondor-CE with JOB_ROUTER_ENTRIES that use bosco as the grid_resource. We've noticed issues with proxy delegation: proxies on the CE are updated through the SPOOL directory but routed bosco jobs don't update their own copies of the proxies in the user's home directory.
